Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Directs telecommunication and cable corporations to provide call center service assistance from centers located within the state
Summary: Directs telecommunications and cable corporations to provide call center service assistance from centers located within the state and such corporations' service areas; includes a list of what services must be provided.
LawCode: Amd ยง65, Pub Serv L; add ยง394-i, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the general business law, in relation to telecommunications and cable call centers
